name: B. Passwords
statement:
Vanya is managed to enter his favourite site Codehorses. Vanya uses
distinct passwords for sites at all, however he can’t remember which one
exactly he specified during Codehorses registration.Vanya will enter
passwords in order of non-decreasing their lengths, and he will enter
passwords of same length in arbitrary order. Just when Vanya will have
entered the correct password, he is immediately authorized on the site.
Vanya will not enter any password twice.Entering any passwords takes one
second for Vanya. But if Vanya will enter wrong password times, then he
is able to make the next try only seconds after that. Vanya makes each
try immediately, that is, at each moment when Vanya is able to enter
password, he is doing that.Determine how many seconds will Vanya need to
enter Codehorses in the best case for him (if he spends minimum possible
number of second) and in the worst case (if he spends maximum possible
amount of seconds).
